properties.SQL Query:
select 
   m.id as madeinrwandaid, 
   m.description,
   m.productioncapacity,
   m.standardmark ,
   m.trademarkcertificate ,
   m.certificationlicensenumber ,
   m.regulatoryrequirement ,
   m.comment ,
   m.origincertificate ,
   m.`date` ,
   m.code ,
   m.bastartdate ,
   m.baenddate ,
   m.batimetotal ,
   m.batimetaken ,
   m.batimeprogress ,
   m.accesscontrolgroup ,
   m.progress ,
   m.syncdate ,
   m.contactpersonemail ,
   m.contactpersonunit,
   c.id as customerid,
   c.name as customername,
   c.rdbnumber as customerrdbnumber,
   c.tin as customertin,
   c.contactperson as customercontactperson,
   c.contactpersonposition as customercontactpersonposition,
   c.website as customerwebsite,
   c.town as customertown,
   c.physicaladdress as customerphysicaladdress,
   c.postaladdress as customerpostaladdress,
   c.industriallicensenumber as customerindustriallicensenumber,
   c.date as customerdate,
   c2.id as cdcmanagerid,
   c2.title as cdcmanagertitle,
   c2.email as cdcmanageremail,
   c2.telephone as cdcmanagertelephone,
   c2.reference as cdcmanagerreference,
   m2.id as madeinrwandastatusid,
   m2.title as madeinrwandastatusttitle,
   b.id as basubmitstatusid,
   b.title as basubmitstatustitle,
   b2.id as baid,
   b2.title as batitle,
   b2.code as bacode,
   b2.description as badesciption,
   b2.icon as baicon,
   b2.displayname as badisplayname,
   b2.datasource as badatasource,
   b2.reference as bareference,
   b3.id as bastepid,
   b3.title as basteptitle,
   b3.configuration as bastepconfiguration,
   b3.reference as bastepreference,
   a.id as accesscontrol,
   a.title as accesscontroltitle,
   a.`object` as accesscontrolobject,
   a.reference as accesscontrolreference,
   d.id as divisionid,
   d.title as divisiontitle,
   d.reference as divisionreference,
   u.id as unitid,
   u.title as unittitle,
   u.reference as unitreference,
   a2.id as assigneeid,
   a2.title as assigneetitle,
   a2.email as assigneeemail,
   a2.telephone as assigneetelephone,
   a2.reference as assigneereference,
   d2.id as delaystatusid,
   d2.title as delaystatustitle   
from madeinrwanda m 
left join customer c on m.customerid = c.id 
left join cdcmanager c2 on m.cdcmanagerid = c2.id 
left join madeinrwandastatus m2 on m.madeinrwandastatusid = m2.id 
left join basubmitstatus b on m.basubmitstatusid = b.id 
left join ba b2 on m.baid = b2.id 
left join bastep b3 on m.bastepid = b3.id 
left join accesscontrol a on m.accesscontrolid = a.id 
left join division d on m.divisionid = d.id 
left join unit u on m.unitid = u.id 
left join assignee a2 on m.assigneeid = a2.id 
left join delaystatus d2 on m.delaystatusid = d2.id ;

properties.SQL Query:
select 
    s.id as standardid,
    s.code,
    s.title,
    s.standard,
    s.`year` ,
    s.amount ,
    s.description ,
    s.pagecount ,
    s.previewpagecount ,
    s.icsnumber ,
    s.standardeditiondate ,
    s.filesize ,
    s.costablepagecount ,
    s.currentreferencenumber ,
    s.revisiondate ,
    s.`date` ,
    s2.id as standardclassificationid,
    s2.title as standardclassificationtitle,
    s3.id as standardtcgroupid,
    s3.tcnumber as standardtcnumber,
    s3.name as standardtcgroupname,
    s4.id as standardeditionid,
    s4.title as standardeditiontitle,
    s5.id as standardformatid,
    s5.title as standardformat,
    s6.id as standardtypeid,
    s6.title as standardtype,
    s7.id as standardwebstorestatusid,
    s7.title as standardwebstorestatus,
    s8.id as standardstatusid,
    s8.title as standardstatus    
from standard s 
left join standardclassification s2 on s.standardclassificationid = s2.id
left join standardtcgroup s3 on s.standardtcgroupid = s3.id
left join standardedition s4 on s.standardeditionid = s4.id 
left join standardformat s5 on s.standardformatid = s5.id
left join standardtype s6 on s.standardformatid = s6.id 
left join standardwebstorestatus s7 on s.standardwebstorestatusid = s7.id
left join standardstatus s8 on standardstatusid = s8.id

properties.SQL Query:
select
    p.id as productcertificationid,
    p.description,
    p.applicationreview ,
    p.contractnumber ,
    p.contractissuedate ,
    p.contractexpirydate ,
    p.contractvalidityduration ,
    p.surveillanceaudit ,
    p.marketsurveillance ,
    p.secondmarketsurveillance ,
    p.recertificationaudit,
    p.certificatenumber ,
    p.certificateexpirydate ,
    p.certificationscope ,
    p.comment ,
    p.sampledeliveryname ,
    p.samplecollectiondate ,
    p.sampledeliverydate ,
    p.lotsize ,
    p.lotnumber ,
    p.`date` ,
    p.code ,
    p.bastartdate ,
    p.baenddate ,
    p.batimetotal ,
    p.batimetaken ,
    p.batimeprogress ,
    p.progress ,
    p.syncdate ,
    p.accesscontrolgroup ,
    p.productionsite ,
    p.productioncapacity,
    c.id as customerid,
    c.name as customername,
    c.rdbnumber as customerrdbnumber,
    c.tin as customertin,
    c.contactperson as customercontactperson,
    c.contactpersonposition as customercontactpersonposition,
    c.website as customerwebsite,
    c.town as customertown,
    c.physicaladdress as customerphysicaladdress,
    c.postaladdress as customerpostaladdress,
    c.industriallicensenumber as customerindustriallicensenumber,
    c.date as customerdate,
    p2.id as productcertificationtypeid,
    p2.title as productcertificationtype,
    p3.id as productcertificationstageid,
    p3.title as productcertificationstage,
    s.id as standardid,
    s.code as standardcode,
    s.title as standardtitle,
    s.standard as standard,
    s.`year` as standardyear,
    s.amount standardamount,
    s.description as standarddescription,
    s.pagecount as standardpagecount,
    s.previewpagecount as standardpreviewpage ,
    s.icsnumber as standardicsnumber,
    s.standardeditiondate as standardeditiondate,
    s.filesize as standardfilesize,
    s.costablepagecount as standardcostablepagecount,
    s.currentreferencenumber as standardcurrentreferencenumber,
    s.revisiondate as standardrevisiondate,
    s.`date` as standarddate,
    p4.id as productgroupid,
    p4.title as productgroup,
    a.id as assigneeid,
    a.title as assigneetitle,
    a.email as assigneeemail,
    a.telephone as assigneetelephone,
    a.reference as assigneereference,
    p5.id as productclassificationid,
    p5.title as productclassification,
    p6.id as productclassificationgradeid,
    p6.title as productclassificationgrade,
    p7.id as productionclassificationtypeid,
    p7.title as productionclassificationtype,
    p8.id as productclassificationanalysisid,
    p8.title as productclassificationanalysis,
    p8.stage as productclassificationanalysisstage,
    p8.samplingpoint as productclassificationanalysissamplingpoint,
    p8.lab as productclassificationanalysislab,
    s2.id as sampleconditionid,
    s2.title as samplecondition,
    s3.id as sampletemperatureid,
    s3.title as sampletemperature,
    c2.id as cdcmanagerid,
    c2.title as cdcmanagertitle,
    c2.email as cdcmanageremail,
    c2.telephone as cdcmanagertelephone,
    c2.reference as cdcmanagerreference,
    p9.id as productcertificationstatusid,
    p9.title as productcertificationstatus,
    p10.id as producttransitionstatusid,
    p10.title as producttransitionstatus,
    b.id as baid,
    b.title as batitle,
    b.code as bacode,
    b.description as badesciption,
    b.icon as baicon,
    b.displayname as badisplayname,
    b.datasource as badatasource,
    b.reference as bareference,
    b2.id as bastepid,
    b2.title as basteptitle,
    b2.configuration as bastepconfiguration,
    b2.reference as bastepreference,
    b3.id as basubmitstatusid,
    b3.title as basubmitstatus
from productcertification p 
left join customer c on p.customerid = c.id 
left join productcertificationtype p2 on p.productcertificationtypeid = p2.id 
left join productcertificationstage p3 on p.productcertificationstageid = p3.id 
left join standard s on p.standardid = s.id 
left join productgroup p4 on p.productgroupid = p4.id 
left join assignee a on p.assigneeid = a.id 
left join productclassification p5 on p.productclassificationid = p5.id 
left join productclassificationgrade p6 on p.productclassificationgradeid = p6.id 
left join productclassificationtype p7 on p.productclassificationtypeid = p7.id 
left join productclassificationanalysis p8 on p.productclassificationanalysisid = p8.id 
left join samplecondition s2 on p.sampleconditionid = s2.id 
left join sampletemperature s3 on p.sampletemperatureid = s3.id 
left join cdcmanager c2 on p.cdcmanagerid = c2.id 
left join productcertificationstatus p9 on p.productcertificationstatusid = p9.id 
left join producttransitionstatus p10 on p.producttransitionstatusid = p10.id 
left join ba b on p.baid = b.id 
left join bastep b2 on p.bastepid = b2.id 
left join basubmitstatus b3 on p.basubmitstatusid = b3.id

properties.SQL Query:
select 
    s.id as systemcertificationid ,
    s.quantity ,
    s.systemcertificationscope ,
    s.activitiesscope ,
    s.description ,
    s.revision ,
    s.scopecompetence ,
    s.scopedefinition ,
    s.auditarea ,
    s.audittime ,
    s.audittimejustification ,
    s.auditopinion ,
    s.officerjustification ,
    s.`date` ,
    s.certificatenumber ,
    s.certificateissuedate ,
    s.certificateexpirydate ,
    s.licensenumber ,
    s.licenseissuedate ,
    s.licenseexpirydate ,
    s.contractnumber ,
    s.contractissuedate ,
    s.contractexpirydate ,
    s.cataloguenumber ,
    s.contractvalidity ,
    s.firstsurveillanceaudit ,
    s.secondsurveillanceaudit ,
    s.recertificationaudit ,
    s.decision ,
    s.directorjustification ,
    s.comment ,
    s.code,
    s.bastartdate ,
    s.baenddate ,
    s.batimetotal ,
    s.batimetaken ,
    s.batimeprogress ,
    s.accesscontrolgroup ,
    s.progress ,
    s.syncdate,
    c.id as customerid,
    c.name as customername,
    c.rdbnumber as customerrdbnumber,
    c.tin as customertin,
    c.contactperson as customercontactperson,
    c.contactpersonposition as customercontactpersonposition,
    c.website as customerwebsite,
    c.town as customertown,
    c.physicaladdress as customerphysicaladdress,
    c.postaladdress as customerpostaladdress,
    c.industriallicensenumber as customerindustriallicensenumber,
    c.date as customerdate,
    s2.id as systemtypeid,
    s2.title as systemtype,
    s3.id as systemcertificationtypeid,
    s3.title as systemcertificationtype,
    s4.id as systemdefinitionid,
    s4.title as systemdefinition,
    p.id as productionsitecountid,
    p.title as productionsitecount,
    p2.id as permanentemployeecountid,
    p2.title as permanentemployeecount,
    c2.id as casualemployeecountid,
    c2.title as casualemployeecount,
    s5.id as standardid,
    s5.code as standardcode,
    s5.title as standardtitle,
    s5.standard as standard,
    s5.`year` as standardyear,
    s5.amount standardamount,
    s5.description as standarddescription,
    s5.pagecount as standardpagecount,
    s5.previewpagecount as standardpreviewpage ,
    s5.icsnumber as standardicsnumber,
    s5.standardeditiondate as standardeditiondate,
    s5.filesize as standardfilesize,
    s5.costablepagecount as standardcostablepagecount,
    s5.currentreferencenumber as standardcurrentreferencenumber,
    s5.revisiondate as standardrevisiondate,
    s5.`date` as standarddate,
    a.id as assigneeid,
    a.title as assigneetitle,
    a.email as assigneeemail,
    a.telephone as assigneetelephone,
    a.reference as assigneereference,
    c3.id as cdcmanagerid,
    c3.title as cdcmanagertitle,
    c3.email as cdcmanageremail,
    c3.telephone as cdcmanagertelephone,
    c3.reference as cdcmanagerreference,
    s6.id as systemcertificationstatusid,
    s6.title as systemcertificationstatus,
    b.id as basubmitstatusid,
    b.title as basubmitstatus,
    b2.id as baid,
    b2.title as batitle,
    b2.code as bacode,
    b2.description as badesciption,
    b2.icon as baicon,
    b2.displayname as badisplayname,
    b2.datasource as badatasource,
    b2.reference as bareference,
    b3.id as bastepid,
    b3.title as basteptitle,
    b3.configuration as bastepconfiguration,
    b3.reference as bastepreference,
    a2.id as accesscontrolid,
    a2.title as accesscontroltitle,
    a2.`object` as accesscontrolobject,
    a2.reference as accesscontrolreference,
    d.id as divisionid,
    d.title as divisiontitle,
    d.reference as divisionreference,
    u.title as unittitle,
    u.reference as unitreference,
    d2.id as delaystatusid,
    d2.title as delaystatus   
from systemcertification s
left join customer c on s.customerid = c.id 
left join systemtype s2 on s.systemtypeid = s.id 
left join systemcertificationtype s3 on s.systemcertificationtypeid = s3.id 
left join systemdefinition s4 on s.systemdefinitionid = s4.id 
left join productionsitecount p on s.productionsitecountid = p.id 
left join permanentemployeecount p2 on s.permanentemployeecountid = p2.id 
left join casualemployeecount c2 on s.casualemployeecountid = c2.id 
left join standard s5 on s.standardid = s5.id 
left join assignee a on s.assigneeid = a.id 
left join cdcmanager c3 on s.cdcmanagerid = c3.id 
left join systemcertificationstatus s6 on s.systemcertificationstatusid = s6.id 
left join basubmitstatus b on s.basubmitstatusid = b.id 
left join ba b2 on s.baid = b2.id 
left join bastep b3 on b3.bastepstatusid = b3.id 
left join accesscontrol a2 on b3.accesscontrolid = b3.id 
left join division d on a.divisionid = d.id 
left join unit u on a.unitid = u.id 
left join delaystatus d2 on s.delaystatusid = d2.id

properties.SQL Query:
select
    t.id as trainingrequestid,
    t.venue,
    t.participants ,
    t.`date`, 
    t.code ,
    t.bastartdate ,
    t.baenddate ,
    t.batimetotal ,
    t.batimetaken ,
    t.batimeprogress ,
    t.accesscontrolgroup ,
    t.syncdate ,
    t.progress ,
    t.delay,
    c.id as customerid,
    c.name as customername,
    c.rdbnumber as customerrdbnumber,
    c.tin as customertin,
    c.contactperson as customercontactperson,
    c.contactpersonposition as customercontactpersonposition,
    c.website as customerwebsite,
    c.town as customertown,
    c.physicaladdress as customerphysicaladdress,
    c.postaladdress as customerpostaladdress,
    c.industriallicensenumber as customerindustriallicensenumber,
    c.`date` as customerdate,
    t2.id as trainingid,
    t2.title as trainingtitle,
    t2.referencenumber as trainingreferencenumber,
    t2.description as trainingdescription,
    t2.sessioncount as trainingsesssioncount,
    t2.sessions as trainingsessions,
    t2.traineecount as traineecount,
    t2.`date` as trainingdate,
    m.id as monthid,
    m.title as month,
    t3.id as trainingrequeststatusid,
    t3.title as trainingrequeststatus,
    b3.id as basubmitstatusid, 
    b3.title as basubmitstatus,
    b.id as baid,
    b.title as batitle,
    b.code as bacode,
    b.description as badesciption,
    b.icon as baicon,
    b.displayname as badisplayname,
    b.datasource as badatasource,
    b.reference as bareference,
    b2.id as bastepid,
    b2.title as basteptitle,
    b2.configuration as bastepconfiguration,
    b2.reference as bastepreference,
    a.id as accesscontrolid,
    a.title as accesscontroltitle,
    a.`object` as accesscontrolobject,
    a.reference as accesscontrolreference,
    d.id as divisionid,
    d.title as divisiontitle,
    d.reference as divisionreference,
    u.id as unitid,
    u.title as unittitle,
    u.reference as unitreference,
    a2.id as assigneeid,
    a2.title as assigneetitle,
    a2.email as assigneeemail,
    a2.telephone as assigneetelephone,
    a2.reference as assigneereference,
    d2.id as delaystatusid,
    d2.title as delaystatus   
from trainingrequest t 
left join customer c on t.customerid = c.id
left join training t2 on t.trainingid = t2.id 
left join `month` m on t.monthid = m.id
left join trainingrequeststatus t3 on t.trainingrequeststatusid = t3.id 
left join ba b on t.baid = b.id 
left join bastep b2 on t.bastepid = b2.id 
left join basubmitstatus b3 on t.basubmitstatusid  = b3.id 
left join accesscontrol a on t.accesscontrolid = a.id 
left join division d on t.divisionid = d.id 
left join unit u on t.unitid = u.id 
left join assignee a2 on t.assigneeid  = a2.id 
left join delaystatus d2 on t.delaystatusid = d2.id

properties.SQL Query:
select 
    c.id as customerproductid,
    c.name, 
    c.brand,
    c.manufacturer ,
    c.description ,
    c.applicationreview ,
    c.licensenumber ,
    c.licenseissuedate ,
    c.certificatenumber ,
    c.certificateissuedate ,
    c.certificateexpirydate ,
    c.certificationscope ,
    c.comment ,
    c.sampledeliveryname ,
    c.samplecollectiondate,
    c.sampledeliverydate ,
    c.lotsize ,
    c.lotnumber ,
    c.applicationexpirydate,
    c.objecttype ,
    c.`object` as productcertificationid,
    c.cataloguenumber ,
    c.`date` ,
    d.id as delegateid,
    d.title as delegate,
    d.email as delegateemail,
    d.telephone as delegatetelephone,
    d.reference as delegatereference,
    s.id as samplepackagingid,
    s.title as samplepackaging,
    d.id as divisionid,
    d.title as divisiontitle,
    d.reference as divisionreference,
    u.id as unitid,
    u.title as unittitle,
    u.reference as unitreference,
    c2.id as customerproductreviewstatusid,
    c2.title as customerproductreviewstatus,
    c3.id as customerproductstatusid,
    c3.title as customerproductstatus
from customerproduct c 
left join delegate d on c.delegateid = d.id 
left join samplepackaging s on c.samplepackagingid = s.id 
left join division d2 on c.divisionid = d2.id 
left join unit u on c.unitid = u.id 
left join customerproductreviewstatus c2 on c.customerproductreviewstatusid = c2.id 
left join customerproductstatus c3 on c.customerproductstatusid = c3.id 
where c.objecttype = 'productcertification'

properties.SQL Query:
select 
    c.id as customerproductid,
    c.name, 
    c.brand,
    c.manufacturer ,
    c.description ,
    c.applicationreview ,
    c.licensenumber ,
    c.licenseissuedate ,
    c.certificatenumber ,
    c.certificateissuedate ,
    c.certificateexpirydate ,
    c.certificationscope ,
    c.comment ,
    c.sampledeliveryname ,
    c.samplecollectiondate,
    c.sampledeliverydate ,
    c.lotsize ,
    c.lotnumber ,
    c.applicationexpirydate,
    c.objecttype ,
    c.`object` as productcertificationid,
    c.cataloguenumber ,
    c.`date` ,
    d.id as delegateid,
    d.title as delegate,
    d.email as delegateemail,
    d.telephone as delegatetelephone,
    d.reference as delegatereference,
    s.id as samplepackagingid,
    s.title as samplepackaging,
    d.id as divisionid,
    d.title as divisiontitle,
    d.reference as divisionreference,
    u.id as unitid,
    u.title as unittitle,
    u.reference as unitreference,
    c2.id as customerproductreviewstatusid,
    c2.title as customerproductreviewstatus,
    c3.id as customerproductstatusid,
    c3.title as customerproductstatus
from customerproduct c 
left join delegate d on c.delegateid = d.id 
left join samplepackaging s on c.samplepackagingid = s.id 
left join division d2 on c.divisionid = d2.id 
left join unit u on c.unitid = u.id 
left join customerproductreviewstatus c2 on c.customerproductreviewstatusid = c2.id 
left join customerproductstatus c3 on c.customerproductstatusid = c3.id 
where c.objecttype = 'madeinrwanda'

properties.SQL Query:
SELECT 
    b.id as baplanid,
    b.auditnumber ,
    b.audittype ,
    b.`scope` ,
    b.criteria ,
    b.objective ,
    b.interpretation ,
    b.startdate ,
    b.enddate ,
    b.`date`, 
    b.objecttype as baplanobjecttype,
    b.`object` ,
    b2.id as bareportid,
    b2.title as bareport,
    b2.content as bareportcontent,
    b2.date as bareportdate,
    b2.objecttype as bareportobejcttype,
    b2.object as bareportobject,
    b3.id as badecisionid,
    b3.decisiondate as badecisiondecisiondate,
    b3.decision as badecisiondecision,
    b3.applicationinformation as badecisionapplicationinformation,
    b3.auditorcompetence as badecisionauditorcompetence,
    b3.auditreport as badecisionauditreport,
    b3.auditplancoverage as badecisionauditplancoverage,
    b3.nonconformities as badecisionnonconformities,
    b3.auditorrecommendation as badecisionauditorrecommendation,
    b3.auditobjectives as badecisionauditobjectives,
    b3.relevantinformation as badecisionrelevantinformation,
    b3.justification as badecisionjustification,
    b3.comment as badecisioncomment,
    b3.suspensionperiod as badecisionsuspensionperiod,
    b3.newscope as badecisionnewscope,
    b3.objecttype as badecisionobjecttype,
    b3.object as badecisionobject,
    b3.date as badecisiondate,
    b4.id as basignatureid,
    b4.comment as basignaturecomment,
    b4.date as basignaturedate,
    b4.objecttype as basignatureobjecttype,
    b4.object as basignatureobject ,
    b5.id as bacustomeraccessid,
    b5.title as bacustomeraccess,
    b6.id as bareportstatusid,
    b6.title as bareportstatus,
    b7.id as badecisiontypeid,
    b7.title as badecisiontype,
    b8.id as badecisionmethodid,
    b8.title as badecisionmethod,
    c.id as cdcmanagerid,
    c.title as cdcmanager,
    c.email as cdcmanageremail,
    c.telephone as cdcmanagertelephone,
    c.reference as cdcmanagerreference,
    c2.id as cdcsecretaryid,
    c2.title as cdcsecretary,
    c2.email as cdcsecretaryemail,
    c2.telephone as cdcsecretarytelephone,
    c2.reference as cdcsecretaryreference,
    c3.id as cdcid,
    c3.title as cdc,
    c3.email as cdcemail,
    c3.telephone as cdctelephone,
    c3.reference as cdcreference,
    c4.id as cdcauxid,
    c4.title as cdcaux,
    c4.email as cdcauxemail,
    c4.telephone as cdcauxtelephone,
    c4.reference as cdcauxreference,
    b9.title as badecisionstatus    
from baplan b 
left join bareport b2 on b2.`object` = b.`object` 
left join bacustomeraccess b5 on b2.bacustomeraccessid = b5.id 
left join bareportstatus b6 on b2.bareportstatusid = b6.id 
LEFT JOIN badecision b3 on b.`object` = b3.`object`
left join badecisiontype b7 on b3.badecisiontypeid = b7.id
left join badecisionmethod b8 on b3.badecisionmethodid = b8.id 
left join cdcmanager c on b3.cdcmanagerid = c.id 
left join cdcsecretary c2  on b3.cdcsecretaryid = c2.id 
left join cdc c3 on b3.cdcid = c3.id 
left join cdcaux c4 on b3.cdcauxid = c4.id 
left join badecisionstatus b9 on b3.badecisionstatusid = b9.id 
LEFT JOIN  basignature b4 ON b4.`object` = b.`object`
left join basignaturestatus b10 on b4.basignaturestatusid = b10.id
WHERE b2.objecttype = b.objecttype AND b.objecttype = b3.objecttype AND b.objecttype = b4.objecttype;

properties.SQL Query:
select 
    c.id as calibrationid, 
    c.quantity, 
    c.description, 
    c.estimatedcompletiondate, 
    c.collectionofficer, 
    c.collectionname, 
    c.collectiondate, 
    c.`date`, 
    c.code, 
    c.bastartdate, 
    c.baenddate, 
    c.batimetotal, 
    c.batimetaken, 
    c.batimeprogress, 
    c.progress, 
    c.syncdate, 
    c.accesscontrolgroup,
    c2.id as customerid ,
    c2.name as customername,
    c2.rdbnumber as customerrdbnumber,
    c2.tin as customertin,
    c2.contactperson as customercontactperson,
    c2.contactpersonposition as customercontactpersonposition,
    c2.website as customerwebsite,
    c2.town as customertown,
    c2.physicaladdress as customerphysicaladdress,
    c2.postaladdress as customerpostaladdress,
    c2.industriallicensenumber as customerindustriallicensenumber,
    c2.date as customerdate,
    c3.id as calibrationtypeid,
    c3.title as calibrationtype,
    d.id as directorapprovalstatusid,
    d.title as directorapprovalstatus,
    a.id as assigneeid,
    a.title as assigneetitle,
    a.email as assigneeemail,
    a.telephone as assigneetelephone,
    a.reference as assigneereference,
    s.id as signatoryid,
    s.title as signatorytitle,
    s.email as signatoryemail,
    s.telephone as signatorytelephone,
    s.reference as signatoryreference,
    a2.id as accountid,
    a2.name as accountname,
    a2.username as accountusername,
    a2.idnumber as accountidnumber,
    a2.extension as accountextension,
    a2.email as accountemail,
    a2.ssfrnumber as accountssfrnumber,
    a2.ramanumber as accountramanumber,
    a2.town as accounttown,
    a2.address as accountaddress,
    a2.leavedays as accountleavedays,
    a2.`date` as accountdate,
    c4.id as calibrationstatusid,
    c4.title as calibrationstatus,
    d2.id as delaystatusid,
    d2.title as delaystatus,
    b.id as baid,
    b.title as batitle,
    b.code as bacode,
    b.description as badescription,
    b.icon as baicon,
    b.displayname as badisplayname,
    b.datasource as badatasource,
    b.reference as bareference,
    b2.id as bastepid,
    b2.title as basteptitle,
    b2.configuration as bastepconfiguration,
    b2.reference as bastepreference,
    b1.id as basubmitstatusid,
    b1.title as basubmitstatustitle,
    a3.id as accesscontrolid,
    a3.title as accesscontroltitle,
    a3.`object` as accesscontrolobject,
    a3.reference as accesscontrolreference,
    d3.id as divisionid,
    d3.title as divisiontitle,
    d3.reference as divisionreference,
    u.id as unitid,
    u.title as unittitle,
    u.reference as unitreference
from calibration c
left join customer c2 on c.customerid = c2.id 
left join calibrationtype c3 on c.calibrationtypeid = c3.id 
left join directorapprovalstatus d  on c.directorapprovalstatusid = d.id 
left join assignee a on c.assigneeid = a.id
left join signatory s on c.signatoryid = s.id 
left join account a2 on c.accountid = a2.id
left join calibrationstatus c4 on c.calibrationstatusid = c4.id 
left join delaystatus d2 on c.delaystatusid = d2.id 
left join ba b on c.baid = b.id 
left join bastep b2 on c.bastepid = b2.id 
left join basubmitstatus b1 on c.basubmitstatusid = b1.id 
left join accesscontrol a3 on c.accesscontrolid = a3.id 
left join division d3 on c.divisionid = d3.id
left join unit u on c.unitid = u.id ;
